readable.title: 3257207516_9d2bc0ea04
readable.content: A boy and a woman in Arab costume making peace signs . A boy and a young woman in a headscarf make peace signs . A girl in a headdress and a boy with a bandanna are giving the peace sign to the camera . A woman wearing a blue headcover and a boy wearing a scarf hold fingers in peace signs . A woman with a blue headdress and a boy with a headband make a peace sign with their fingers
